title: People AFK in normals
body:
What's up with all of the disconnectors in normals? They die once or twice then leave.
In my last 3 games this has happened 100% of the time, twice on enemy team and once on our team. Then this morning I'm spectating my first game and the same thing happens. And in game chat a guy complains that its happened to him in his last 4 games!

Get some balls kiddies. If you are against a smurf, play the game out and learn what you did right/wrong.

If you wanna WIN, you will LOSE firstly. Nobody is born a challenger level player.

P.S. This post was taken down previous because apparently I was naming names by putting up a picture of a screen that I was spectating on. I did not name any names, I just posted what I saw as a third party spectator.

replies.body: happens everywhere even in arams...i found after this new year season its gotten a lot toxic. have to wait all the kids to go to school
